subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants are closing in on a multiyear contract for Tom Coughlin, who deftly recast himself as a willing ally of his players and steered the team to a surprising Super Bowl victory.
snippet: The Giants are closing in on a multiyear contract for Tom Coughlin, who deftly recast himself as a willing ally of his players and steered the team to a surprising Super Bowl victory.
